participant_1.background:
I am proud of my career, but I still miss my dad.
i enjoy vacations at the beach.
I wake up early and enjoy a cup of coffee with my boyfriend before we head to work.
I have no siblings, but I love spending time with my friends and family at our cabin in the woods on the lake.
my favorite band is ween.

participant_2.background:
I have a secret stash of snacks in my room that my parents don't know about.
i have been at my job for seven years.
I'm often not taken seriously because of my pink hair.
I want to use my skills to help people in need.
during the week , i work as a barista.

content.text: Not bad! Just got home from work. How about yours?
Good, thanks! I'm headed to the beach with my friends and family.
That sounds fun! I love the beach. I used to go there all the time when I was a kid.
Me too! It's so relaxing. Do you have any siblings?
No, I'm an only child. But I have a lot of cousins, so I never really felt like I was missing out.
Oh, that's cool. I have one brother, but I'm closer to my friends than I am to him.
I feel the same way. My friends are like my family.
I know what you mean. I'm lucky to have such great friends.
Me too! I'm going to miss them when I go back to work tomorrow.
I know what you mean. I always feel a little sad when I have to leave the beach.
Me too! But it's always nice to come back home.
Exactly! I'm excited to see my boyfriend and my dog.
That's great! I hope you have a great time!
